name: Citadel of the Ancible
description:
Citadel of the Ancible is a 2D Tile Based RPG Game - Trapped in an unknown dungeon by an evil wizard, you have to find your way out of by defeating monsters, leveling up, gaining abilities, and most importantly - collecting loot. 

Controls

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Attack enemies by moving into them
  • Number keys (1-9, 0)  to use hot bar items
    • Consumable Items and abilities are draggable by the mouse
  • System Keys:
    • I for Inventory
    • C for Character Equipment and Stats
    • P for Abilities
    • O for Outfits
    • T for Talents

WARNING - Game is still in development and changes are likely to happen that will result in save files becoming incompatible with newer versions. Cherish your save files, hold them close - their end is near.

Programmed and Designed by Hoby2000 - Discord

Music by TepG - Youtube, Spotify, Twitter

Asset Credits:

LunarSignals - Terrain, Monsters, Special FX, UI

Pixel Mobs - Monsters, Special FX

Juhani Junkala - Sound FX

Jimmy Campbell - Font

ClayManStudio - Icons
